mapper.select: select b.id as userId, b.level as actingLevel, c.amount as commissionAmount, c.create_date as createDate, d.sumTotal as amount, e.commissionAmount as commissionAmount, a.lowerLevel_id as lowerLevelId from acting_hierarchy_relation a left join acting b on a.acting_id = b.id left join (select (sum(amount)) as commissionAmount, create_by from acting_commission_detail group by create_by) e on e.create_by = a.create_by left join (select (sum(amount)) as sumTotal, create_by from grab_red_packets group by create_by) d on a.create_by = d.create_by left join sys_user c on a.create_by = c.id where a.superior_id = #{id} order by c.create_date desc
